item.title: Trump Administration Says It Has Begun Immigration Crackdown in Chicago
item.description: In Chicago, advocates for immigrants said they saw several arrests on Sunday, but were uncertain of the scale of federal action.

item.title: Supreme Court Lifts Restrictions on L.A. Immigration Stops
item.description: A federal judge had ordered agents not to make indiscriminate stops relying on factors like a person’s ethnicity or that they speak Spanish.

item.title: CBS Taps Conservative Policy Veteran for New Ombudsman Role
item.description: Kenneth R. Weinstein, who will review complaints about CBS News, was head of the right-leaning Hudson Institute, a think tank, and has no experience o...

item.title: The Murdoch Succession Fight Is Over. So What Does Lachlan Control?
item.description: From Fox News to Tubi to HarperCollins, here’s what is in the media empire that Rupert Murdoch built.

item.title: Murdoch Family Puts Lachlan in Control, Resolving Succession Fight
item.description: Lachlan Murdoch will take control of a new family trust in a deal worth $3.3 billion, ensuring that his father’s media empire will retain its conserva...
